error.min_lower_max: Min salary must be lower than max salary
error.start_earlier_end: Start time must be earlier than end time
error.end_must_be_future: End time must be in the future

intruction.title: Use common job titles for searchability Advertise only one job, e.g. 'Nurse', not 'nurse' no general opportunities or events
intruction.area: Use location to attract the most suitable candidates If you check the 'fully remote' box, add at least one country. Some job boards require a position
intruction.description: Format into sections and lists to improve readability Avoid targeting specific demographics, e.g. gender, nationality and age No need to add a link to sign up (a link is added automatically dynamic)

placeholder.description: Enter the job description here; include key areas of responsibility and what the candidate might do on a typical day.
placeholder.benefits: Enter the job benefits here; include ke areas of responsibility and what the candidate might do on a typical day.
placeholder.requirements: Enter the job requirements here; include ke areas of responsibility and what the candidate might do on a typical day.

tell_applicant_about_this_role: Tells applicants about this role, including job title, location and requirements.
design_app_form: Design the application form for this role.
invite_or_add: Invite or add co-workers to collaborate on this job.
create_a_kit: Create a kit or assessment test for a structured interview process.
